channel.title: Runescape hacking
channel.description:
My friend is really scared because his friend left teamviewer on and he connected to his computer and stole the user pass and bank pin from a rs acc that had 152m he split with me because he didnt want me to tell anyone and that guy was like ima call the police on you!! MY DAD IS ON THE PHONE
Ik is not really possible but i need to make sure? So can you go to jail or not?

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:420069”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/7zc9h.png 2011-Mar-06 04:19:05

I wasn’t an asshole enough to steal his passwords or anything (although he did have rsbot t so I probably could have), and Moparisthebest himself suggested I put horse porn on is computer to teach him a lesson (which I also didn’t do), but I did put that status on his facebook.

I didn’t hack anything, he let me in, and the same thing happened to your friend. Stealing is still wrong and I would ban him if he was registered here, but I doubt it’s illegal. IANAL though.[/quote]

LOLOLOLOL, oh you xD

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

if you are outside the U.K you can not have any legal action taken place upon you.
[/quote]
so just my point dont worry nothing can happen because flavius i know you dont live in the u.k people say its part of the u.k but it is not.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:420069”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/7zc9h.png 2011-Mar-06 04:19:05

I wasn’t an asshole enough to steal his passwords or anything (although he did have rsbot t so I probably could have), and Moparisthebest himself suggested I put horse porn on is computer to teach him a lesson (which I also didn’t do), but I did put that status on his facebook.

I didn’t hack anything, he let me in, and the same thing happened to your friend. Stealing is still wrong and I would ban him if he was registered here, but I doubt it’s illegal. IANAL though.[/quote]
This is fucking amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/images/7zc9h.png 2011-Mar-06 04:19:05

I wasn’t an asshole enough to steal his passwords or anything (although he did have rsbot t so I probably could have), and Moparisthebest himself suggested I put horse porn on is computer to teach him a lesson (which I also didn’t do), but I did put that status on his facebook.

I didn’t hack anything, he let me in, and the same thing happened to your friend. Stealing is still wrong and I would ban him if he was registered here, but I doubt it’s illegal. IANAL though.

Read full topic

MY DAD IS ON THE PHONE

if you are outside the U.K you can not have any legal action taken place upon you.

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I doubt the police will give two shits about getting gold stolen from a game. It is illegal to access the information, but I highly doubt anything will happen. That one Timmy kid got hacked, but from my knowledge no charges were pressed.

it’s impossilbe be hacking if the one dont have ur id and pw , but if u need others help , u can contact me on my msn golds@egsale.com ,

What in the fuck…?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

since it was like 150m in real life thats like on average $80 if your lucky… an attorney is like thousands i think they wud make u give it back. lol not to worry at all

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Don’t worry about it, aswell there isn’t much proof and it is his own fault so most likely if any charges were pressed they’d end up being dropped.

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Your buddy technically hacked into his computer (gaining access without permission. You could have played the dumb card and say ur buddy gave it to you for no reason. they wouldnt be able to prove that he did or didnt

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:8, topic:420069”]True, but thats not what would show up on paper if he were arrested, it would show he stole information via team-viewer, runescape would not matter at that point,

Had to go back and read again, I missed a few details the first time.[/quote]
Correct; obviously it would be mentioned, but most likely not play a big role in the charges.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape hacking
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

tyb97:

Yeah… but if you were a cop, would you really go arrest someone for a game? No. The most that could happen is that fagex bans you…

Uh, yes - it is illegal to access other people’s information (no matter what the information is) in that manner.

Read full topic
